website_summaries.verdict: The best option for the greatest amount of storage. Utilizes extra height to store more shoes than similar products.
pros: Tall cabinet offers plenty of space for large shoe collections or families with limited space
Narrow width makes it easy to fit in small spaces
cons: Extra height makes accessing shoes on upper shelves more difficult

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great option for price!
customer_reviews.text: As shown in pics, a part of the exterior ‘molding’ came damaged but I managed to put it in an unoticable place. The cubbies are fixed, which I knew but still worth noting. It took myself, alone, 70 minutes to unbox, assemble, place cabs and break down trash. I like how they look and I’m happy to see my shoes again!
customer_reviews.author: FeitclubTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great storage for narrow spaces, but small shoe cubbies
customer_reviews.text: This shoe rack worked out perfectly for the little shoe room we have. It fits in there just right and solved a big shoe storage problem for us. The one bummer is that the cubbies are a little too small for shoes with big heels. It does have the ability to leave out some shelves in order to fit taller boots, tho. It’s just that the width leaves something to be desired. Still perfect for what I needed, but if you have more space and want something to fit all varieties of shoes, you may want to get something a bit larger.
customer_reviews.author: Aubriellea

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe rack!
customer_reviews.text: The box was damaged during shipment which caused a long trim board to be broken in half. I called the Mfg. and they couldn't have been nicer or more accommodating. They immediately sent out a replacement board. Great customer service. I put it together by myself with no trouble at all. I am more than pleased with this purchase and would highly recommend it for anyone who likes their shoes organized!
customer_reviews.author: Wings

customer_reviews.title: hard to assemble--missing and damaged shelves
customer_reviews.text: What a nightmare to assemble. Flimsy shelves that you have to get "just so" in order for them to stay together, then don't sneeze, because they will fall apart. So upset with this purchase. Missing a shelf, see picture. Another shelf scarred with what looks like two attempts to cut the joining section. Will not buy from this company again. Cube sections are so small, and I only wear a 7-7.5 size shoe. This should be sold as a kids shoe cubby for a classroom.
customer_reviews.author: HRFinn

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe organizer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe organizer for my 10 year old. I know she'll eventually use most slots. It's well built and she and I (mother) put it together. The box was super heavy and it took me and my husband bringing it to her room to put it together. Her shoe pairs fit in each slot, however, there's no way an adult woman's heels could fit in one slot. This product is sturdy and well built. Thanks Prepac.
customer_reviews.author: Lugutoo2

customer_reviews.title: Very study. Lots of space!
customer_reviews.text: I have looked at this option for some storage for months. Now that I have it, I wish I hadn’t waited so long to buy it! Well worth the small investment.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking organizer
customer_reviews.text: This cubby is exactly what I was looking for and works great. OJ Commerce has great customer service - the first one I was sent was damaged in transit and they sent me out another one right away to replace it and that one arrived in perfect condition. It's a pretty heavy box so you will probably need 2 people to safely lift it because of the awkward size and weight in the box. Overall I think it's good quality and looks nicer than the cheap boxy-looking ones so I'm happy with my purchase and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: badgergirl75

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: We love our shoe storage! We put this in a closet with this piece in the middle and my husband added small shelves on each side of it as well as a couple of longer shelves above it. We are so happy with our new organized closet. Piece is much sturdier than we expected, holds a ton of shoes, and husband said it wasn't difficult at all to put together and the directions were good. I like that I can fit 2 pairs of adult flip flops in each cubby. Happy to have found this piece. Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Sparrowshell

customer_reviews.title: Nice large sturdy shoe holder
customer_reviews.text: The box weights about 80lbs and I was a bit worried it might have broken pieces when delivered, but it was very well packed, and no issues. Took an hour or so to put together, but mostly easy. One comment, when inserting the inner set of slats (11 small pieces, and a couple of long ones), fit the slats together, but instead of trying to put the whole thing in horizontally on the ground, it worked much better to lift the outer frame, and insert the constructed slats vertically. When horizontal, the slats would slide apart. So vertical worked best for me. Great value for the money. Wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Aycock

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cabinet. I bought 2 to outfit my new closet system. The only issue I had was the way it is designed per the instructions you fit the cubbies together and the entire piece with the cubbies is put into the cabinet while it is face down but all the pieces fall off when turned over. I read previous reviews to use tape to hold them in place that was a help but when I put the second cabinet together I inserted the cubbies while it was standing up and it took 1/4 of the time it was hassle free.
customer_reviews.author: S.R.

customer_reviews.title: Size of your shoe will determine if this will work for you.
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this completely by myself-I do not recommend it. I did it but it was difficult. It is for the most part heavy-except the backing is flimsy cardboard. I wear a size 8 shoe. Half of my shoes fit side by side in the cubbie holes. The other half I had to turn at least one of the shoes on its side. Also, this will not fit high heels. Low heels yes. I had an issue with anything over 1". Overall, I am happy with this but I would probably not buy it again unless they increased the size of the cubbie holes first.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Looks really good, works perfect for my shoe collection, fits in an odd space in my closet
customer_reviews.text: The shoe organizer is a great size, not too big and not small. Looks really good ( except for the rather large ding on the front edge of one of the vertical sides ). I love the number of shoe cubbies. I had an odd wall in my closet and this fit perfectly. It also helped me eliminate all my shoe boxes and crudely stacked shoes. My only issue was the large ding in an area the will be in plain sight.
customer_reviews.author: G-NUT

customer_reviews.title: Nice, not the sturdiest but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: This thing looks great and does what I expect it to do. It does not hold my husbands shoes as I originally purchased it for him, he's a men's size 13. I'm a women's size 8 or Grade School 6 and they work perfect for my sneakers and booties. It's not the sturdiest piece but it does look good and will serve its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan C.

customer_reviews.title: Great cabinet- Wish cubbies were slightly bigger.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived sooner than expected. If you are patient and follow instructions, super easy to set up. It is very sturdy and comes with a “wall anchor” (zip tie and anchors). I am happy with my purchase, but feel $130-$150 would be a better purchase price for the value. Really, I wish the cubbies were a bit larger. Most of my shoes (flats, pumps, sandals, tennis shoes) are all stowed sideways and heels cannot sit up. Maybe 2 inch heels. That is why I gave value 4 stars. Other than that, I am happy with it for the purpose it serves. Fits perfectly in my small closet and made more space in my closet. Thank you again!
customer_reviews.author: Jeri

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay. Overpriced for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: A lot smaller than expected. You can’t fit shoes side by side. They fit like they would in a shoe box; one flat and one sideways. Definitely takes two people to assemble. Other than that it serves its purpose. Didn’t like the fact that as soon as I bought it, the seller dropped it by $10 the very next day. Stupid...
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great for use it in garage or storage room
customer_reviews.text: It’s adequate for my use of it in the garage. I would not use it inside my home accept in a closet It’s a bit too cheesy for interior furniture. Assembling was easy accept for the dividers. It’s a bit tricky to keep them interlocked while installing them. If you are concerned about the cubby sizes - I wear 11 1/2 and the my fit fine. Perfect fit my wife’s shoes.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is so awesome. It was so easy to put together. You will need two people to put the shelves in straight and to stand the unit up. It is very heavy 70 pounds. I’m so excited to build my second one. Fits shoes great and can fit 2-3 pair of flip flops/sandals in one cubby. Even tennis shoes fit comfortably. It’s a little on the expensive side but well worth it once it is together.
customer_reviews.author: teacher 69

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe rack was probably the easiest thing I have ever assembled. Some of my husbands shoes are so big they have to have a slot of their own. But for most of the the shows I could get both shoes into one slot. I am so in love, I will order more for my shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Hawkes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Also as a Fabric Library/Organizer/Cubby, Not A Shoe Holder!
customer_reviews.text: As an avid seamstress, I purchased this as a fabric organizer/library, not as a shoe holder, and it's doing the job pretty well! Only problem is that the slats/shelves are individually not as strong as I'd like them to be, but overall, not a bad item. It does its job well.
customer_reviews.author: LeRatonLaveur

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Needed a tall, slim profile shoe storage and this fit perfectly. Both my husband’s and my shoes fit in the cubbies. I wasn’t able to fit my short boots like some reviewers did, so I store them on top. Assembly was fairly easy. It helped having two of us to keep things in alignment until it was fully assembled. Overall, very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: dale

customer_reviews.title: Will need two people to put the insert in, cannot do alone.
customer_reviews.text: Just for information, one of my side boards was cracked, not all the way through, so I am going to use anyway, not worth the trouble of trying to repackage and return.. I have just put a lot of super glue in the crack and hope it will be fine. This is my second one I have purchased and I really like it so I am hoping for the best!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Looney

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Likes: wanted a shoe cubbie wall shelf...got a shoe cubbie for a wall shelf. Will work for intended purpose. Dislikes: 1) no markings on parts as to what they are. Was a guessing game as to which piece is what. 2) one side has ugly yellowish tint with veins running down (pictures) and looks ugly! 3) cheap looking for the amount of money it was; expected it to look as cute as in the picture but unfortunately does not. 4) white “paint” is chipping off/peeling off some parts of the wood material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe cabinets.
customer_reviews.text: I rent a house, so I can not build custom closet. Even if I buy a house, these are such a great idea. I have 4” heels that fit in carefully. I’m 58 and I put 3 together today. I can’t feel my back, but I did it myself. Use the blue tape! Great idea from another review!
customer_reviews.author: Serina F.

customer_reviews.title: Missed it, by that much.
customer_reviews.text: Received this yesterday and put it together today. It's a good quality piece and the directions for assembly are understandable. My only beef, the two long trim pieces were damaged. This item weighs over 80 lbs. And is over 6 feet in length. It seemed a bigger ass ache to get this item back to UPS than to got Home Depot and buy a couple firing strips and replace the damaged piece. The damaged piece kinda took the shine off this very functionable piece. 2 stars for presentation because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Campese

customer_reviews.title: Great show storage
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet holds most of my shoes, none of my boots. I had to lay some of my shoes on their side to fit into the openings, though, so if you have medium size feet and like heels, you won't be able to stand all of them up in the openings. Glad to get rid of the pile of shoes on the floor and into some order. This cabinet fit the bill in that regard.
customer_reviews.author: Edie

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Designed
customer_reviews.text: This piece was surprisingly easy to assemble considering the number of pieces. It is VERY well engineered and designed. The shoe cubby sizes are a little snug but mens 10 1/2 tennis shoes still fit comfortably. A+
customer_reviews.author: Alan R. Vankirk

customer_reviews.title: Hole are small , hight heels don’t fit
customer_reviews.text: The holes are really small , this rack is not made for hight heel , this is perfect for sandal and sleep on shoes ...sad because has a lot storage , I have a lot of shoes and I figured out how to put my heels 👠 inside this small hole ... struggle SMH 🤦‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: The item looks nice in the pictures but is paper thin I ordered this despite the reviews and it came in damaged due to being so thin. I didn’t even get to unpack and I’ve already see damage. Please reference the photos. Definitely not worth $151. What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: WH

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe rack for small apartments
customer_reviews.text: Living in a small apartment, storage is so important. I'd looked around for a while to find a shoe storage rack that would not only hold all our shoes and boots, but was not huge and bulky. I found this one and the price is terrific, holds everything except our big snow boots and matches our other bedroom furniture. It is easy to assemble, I did it by myself in just over an hour. Overall a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: P. Stinson

customer_reviews.title: Shoe slots not that large
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 8.5 M in a shoe size. My shoes barely fit in a slot, by the pair. If you're a size 10 or more, good luck. If you are a man with size 11 or 12 shoe, forget about it. Otherwise, it is a very nice looking piece. It is fairly easy to assemble (my 19 year old put two together and they look great and it didn't take him long), just follow the instructions and have a power driver set to assist you. It makes it faster and easier and goes a whole lot better when assembling.
customer_reviews.author: Renee S.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality product, so easy to put it together. Totally worth buying it. Would recommend it to everyone who is looking to organize all the shoes. It won't fit mens shoe something to keep in mind , will have to put one shoe in each compartment. I got it for me and the kids shoes and they all fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: shahin

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but compliments
customer_reviews.text: We have had this shoe rack for a few months now and multiple people have commented on it and asked where we bought it. It looks great and works well. The spaces are a little tight for size 12 shoes, but you just have to put the heels at opposite ends. No big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis S.

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t be afraid to buy this due to the assembly worries. My 14-year-old granddaughter and I put this together in well under an hour. We did not experience any issues. I think it’s a nice piece. Someone with large shoes may find the slots a little tight, but I haven’t had any issues. I use extra spaces for small purses and such.
customer_reviews.author: -thebookbag-

customer_reviews.title: A space saving way to keep shoes organized!
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing I don't like about this product, it looks great in my closet and all my shoes and my husband's shoes are off the floor and organized! Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attention Quilter's! Perfect for Stash Storage
customer_reviews.text: I'm a quieter and bought two to organize and store my fat quarters and precut fabrics. Perfection! They're cheery and bright, perfect sized, showing off my palette and keeping it within easy reach. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Livin' The Dream in RSF

customer_reviews.title: 2 people needed at one point in the assemble process.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with this shoe cabinet. No problems with assembly but at one point you definitely need two people. Most cubbies will hold two shoes (ladies size 9) with no problem but heavier made hiking shoes or boots will need to be one per cubbie. Now I don't have shoes stored in several spots and have to spend time looking for the pair I want..
customer_reviews.author: jjones

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly. Easily Reconfigured For Tall Boots. Sturdy. Able To Put Together By Myself.
customer_reviews.text: Did not take long to put together, I was able to do by myself. Very solid, heavy. Looks great. I brought 2 and love them. You can leave some sections out, as I did, see photo, to provide space for larger items, such as boots.
customer_reviews.author: Just AZK

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: we received the wrong color. Too much trouble ( too heavy) to return, so we are stuck with a piece of furniture that does not belong. The shelves are narrow, it wont withstand a move, overall disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Stella K.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality!
customer_reviews.text: This shoes cabinet is sturdy and holds lots of shoes. The only problem is that it isn’t tall/wide enough to fit my ankle boots.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Shoes don't fit and squares uneven
customer_reviews.text: I would not advise buying this shoe organizer unless all you wear is tennis shoes and flip flops because that is all that will fit into it. Unfortunately u was very excited about this shoe organizer since I have many shoes and different styles but the squares are uneven and the only shoes that fit were my flats, tennis shoes and flip flops my boots won't even fit one to a hole and my heels are shoved in there couldn't even sit up if I placed them one to a hole. It looked nice but definitely not practical and especially for the amount i paid for it. Very dissapointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda b.

customer_reviews.title: Functional shoe storage that looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: The final step in assembly is easier with 2 people, otherwise needs some ingenuity to do it alone. The look and feel of this storage unit is exactly what I was hoping for. The top 2 shelves hold slightly taller shoes, so otherwise wedges or high heels may not fit right in other spots. I wear a size 8.5 and found that shoes fit better with alternate in/out, versus toes in or both heels out.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Got lots of shoes? You need this sturdy piece. This is it!
customer_reviews.text: Substantial piece of furniture, holds lots. Double up flats or flip flops, too. Leave out a shelf divider for boots. It's really worth the time & effort to assemble, looks great, sturdy. I bought another! This one I assembled in a snap. Your friends will be jealous.
customer_reviews.author: soozie!

customer_reviews.title: So So quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is not as sturdy or good quality as I had hoped for. It is easy to assemble but unfortuantely once assembled it is not of good quality. It is okay to use inside closet but it is not the best piece for lots and lots of shoes. Your pumps will barely fit inside without have to twist them so not very good for shoe visibility. it will do the job mildly.
customer_reviews.author: israel Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Minor damage
customer_reviews.text: Some minor damage upon arrival, however it’s not that noticeable after it’s together. Holds women’s size 7 shoes well. Tennis shoes were a little more tight fitting than dress shoes. Would not be able to fit heals over 3 inches unless they were laid on their side. Overall very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Conley

customer_reviews.title: Challenge to assemble but great piece
customer_reviews.text: Super frustrating to put together and damaged the top when I put it together and was trying to get the dowels in despite it being on carpet. It’s amazing for multiple pairs of shoes though
customer_reviews.author: ashleeb

customer_reviews.title: Love my cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This is my second cabinet! I love these cabinets!!! A great addition to my room!
customer_reviews.author: ANITA

customer_reviews.title: Bought one and added another. A+
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my husband and loved it so much that I bought another for myself. The second one arrived with a little bit of minor damage that my husband was able to work around and camouflage. The box it comes in is rather heavy and likely it was dropped. I was able to put two pairs of shoes in almost every cubbie. (Yes, I'm a centipede.) I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: M. S. Poppell

customer_reviews.title: DIFFICULT TO PUT TOGETHER
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to put this cabinet together with no luck. I called the number on the instruction page and was told to take it apart and try again. I took it apart several times, and tried to put it together. The problem part was the insert cubicles. They don't seem to be the right size to fit in. I am not happy because this cabinet was not cheap. I would not recommend this to anyone. Zero rating from me.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but a bit tricky to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Overall this cabinet works really well and looks great. It was a bit tricky to put together and quite heavy. It definitely took two of us to do the job and get it in place. It is exactly what I needed for our closet.
customer_reviews.author: TEENA W ROBINSON

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe storage !
customer_reviews.text: A great way to store a ton of shoes! I easily fit a pair in each cubby. It’s best to have 2 people for assembly & be mindful of front facing edges.
customer_reviews.author: Laj

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is just what I wanted. Also ordered clear shoes bags to store my shoes. They fit in this cabinet and it is easy to see and select the pair I want.
customer_reviews.author: WhoMe

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Looks really good in our walk in closet
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Looks really good in our walk in closet. I can fit 2 pairs in some of the cubbies due to the shoe make. Others like bulky sneakers will hold 1. No boots will fit of course. I would buy this again. Great space saver. The white color is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: DeDee

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy for shoe lovers!!!
customer_reviews.text: So for the price this is a decent storage unit. The shelves seem a little flimsy at first but once we got everything together there is no movement and it holds a lot of my shoes. I wear an 8.5 to 9 in women’s and my shoes fit fine. I put one with the heel facing out and the other side the opposite way and it looks neat and organized!
customer_reviews.author: ‘Cuse girl

customer_reviews.title: Great storage for small narrow spaces
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to fit in a narrow space but hold lots of shoes . Was pleased to find this . A bit pricey but it’s what I needed. Takes about an hour to assemble. I did it alone so it’s not hard .
customer_reviews.author: booshabug

customer_reviews.title: serves it's function very well
customer_reviews.text: While it was difficult to put the sections in the framework, once in, it is very nice! Takes two people, though.. they said it and they mean it! lol
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Carothers

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. No shoes on the floor
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this product. It is keeping my shoes off my closet floor. I have it in my closet. It looks nice and I have used some of the top cubbies to store other items besides shoes. Looks very nice and not too horrible to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more can't find my shoes
customer_reviews.text: Luv Luv Love it. Easy to assemble. Had to go on line to find out how to tighten the screws. After that I was sailing. All 36 pair of my 61/2 and 7’S are a perfect fit. Everyone in the S Eastern US has a picture of my new Shoe Caddy. Love It.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Brunswick,Ga

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made But easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the assembly directions were easy to follow and accurate. The only thing I didn’t like was that the package came with a couple dents in the packaging which resulted in a dented side of an exposed areas of the shelving unit. Probably happened during delivery and not by the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Lambrecht

customer_reviews.title: Good product but damaged on arrival
customer_reviews.text: The product is perfect and looks great with the other Prepac products that we have for our mudroom. However, a few pieces were damaged and cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Jay

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Buy ):
customer_reviews.text: It was horrible.. chipped in so many places. I had read reviews but still kept hope, hoping it wasn’t that bad and I would be able to conceal those spots. Definitely not!! Chipped EVERYWHERE. So sad!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice cabinet holds a lot of shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I like this cabinet as it holds all my shoes and even my booties. I can put two pair of shoes in one slot. It was difficult to assemble however. It came with 2 of the same side so I had to write the company to have them send a replacement side which was inconvenient in my small bedroom. It is fairly sturdy once it’s assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Tess Stammers

customer_reviews.title: shoe rack
customer_reviews.text: This is really sturdy, went together well with easy to follow directions and looks great in my closet
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi

customer_reviews.title: Tall sturdy and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Superb shoe rack, sturdier than any plastic version. Smaller nook size but shoes still fit for up to size 7.5 without issues.
customer_reviews.author: karthik

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: The product came damage but I didn't want to return it and order a new one. the last part of assembling is not as easy as describe but its ok
customer_reviews.author: Sonia E.

customer_reviews.title: Particle board...very low quality materials
customer_reviews.text: This is a total rip off. The shoe shelf is very flimsy and low quality material. At this point I’m regretting not building a higher quality shoe shelf myself at a 1/4 of the price. Had this been $50 I’d say it’s almost worth it but this thing is a POS.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou Rousseau

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase. Arrived on time and great price for the product. Very easy instructions I have been looking for shoe organizers and this price is amazing. Very sturdy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Girl

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and able to assemble solo
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble. Placing the assembled grid into the cabinet was the hardest. I completely assembled this by myself and I’m a 45 year old woman. It is heavy, this sturdy. This is my second one.
customer_reviews.author: Marci S

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, did it myself in under 2 hours, looks great and very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. Takes about 20 minutes to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: Broken pieces
customer_reviews.text: Not one to usually write a review but I am very disappointed with this product. I bought it as a gift to set it up for a friend and when I unpacked it two slats were completely broken in half. I am calling the manufacturer to replace the parts, but due to the late arrival and now broken pieces, I wasn’t able to surprise my friend on their birthday. An overall disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a gym
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our work gym. It is sturdy, easy to install. There is a front and backside to it. Fits shoes, badge lanyards and keys. Nice, clean look.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe storage unit
customer_reviews.text: Was having difficulty storing all my shoes...then I found this! Was easy to assemble, quality is good...I particularly liked the narrow width of the unit...fit perfectly where I wanted to use it! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Legalartist

customer_reviews.title: Solid piece of furniture for shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Very solid piece of furniture. Holds lots of shoes. You can easily put 1 pair in each slot (loafers, flip flops, casual sneakers).
customer_reviews.author: Mycabrandz

customer_reviews.title: Great storage unit
customer_reviews.text: This item is described accurately. It was fairly easy to assemble. Larger shoes, such as boots, may not fit.
customer_reviews.author: KARLA BURGOS

customer_reviews.title: Damaged from manufacturer.
customer_reviews.text: A component was found damaged straight from manufacturer. Unable to assemble under those circumstances. Part replacement was ordered. If no reply shortly I will return the whole thing and buy something from somewhere else. $150 for a shoe rack is a lot and you would expect quality. I guess is just an overpriced item...
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great Look!!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love these. I bought two and they look like built-ins in my walk-in closet. They are beautiful, sturdy and easy to assemble. Very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to put together but it came with some dings I'm hmguessing from shipping and the are parts where the pant was scratched off, the paint job isn't the best with some places with extra paint and some with out. Also it only really fits one shoe per box
customer_reviews.author: Kalid Al

customer_reviews.title: Lower quality that I expected but real issue is that ...
customer_reviews.text: Lower quality that I expected but real issue is that it was short several parts of the hardware which are unique and not available at hardware stores so it required me waiting for the manufacturer to mail them to me directly from Canada. So it sat unpacked, partially assembled for a week while waiting for the parts.
customer_reviews.author: Fusion2009

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for me.
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for my need. I wanted something to store my yarn. It was perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: Colette Chatterton

customer_reviews.title: A must have for shoe storage!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this purchase. This product is absolutely beautiful. The instructions for this were VERY easy to follow. This will take you about 20 minutes to put together and easy enough for one person to do alone.
customer_reviews.author: Germaen Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great solid product
customer_reviews.text: Love this cabinet. Use it as a shoe organizer. It arrived timely. However arrived with a piece broken. Called prepackaged department and no problem they were sending right away. Received in a week. Looks great love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Crap product, arrived broken. Couldn't fix. Hard to return a 50 pound box. Do not buy, complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this in my new closet. Doesn’t take up much room and holds lots of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Kohr

customer_reviews.title: Love this cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this shoe cabinet! Great value for the money. I can say that this may not be ideal for everyone as the slots are a bit small for some shoes if you have larger sizes. I'm a 6 1/2.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: My shoe rack
customer_reviews.text: I really love my shoe rack. Very sturdy and all my shoes are off of the floor!!
customer_reviews.author: Tweety

customer_reviews.title: Should be 2 cubbies wide not 3
customer_reviews.text: At this width you can't put an average pair of gym shoes in 1 cubby hole. 1 shoe per hole. Will work for heels.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Small individual boxes
customer_reviews.text: Boxes are alot smaller in width. Shoes dont fix unless you have to squeeze them in
customer_reviews.author: marina

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before buying so I was prepared for the cubbies to be a tad on the small size. Ankle boots have to be split - one shoe per hole. Overall it's exactly what I wanted and dresses up my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Rhett King

customer_reviews.title: Great for large number of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for a family with a lot of shoes. My only complaint is the faux paint job comes off easily (came off in a couple places during assembly). But this is relatively inexpensive so I can live with it.
customer_reviews.author: SJJ

customer_reviews.title: Solid shoe storage
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this shoe storage! Relatively easy to put together and very sturdy. Exactly what I’ve been looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Easy to assemble. Looks great. A couple of blemishes on two shelves but I hid those on the bottom so no problem. The shipping package is heavy so be prepared to ask for some help.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: I love it’s size. The width and depth is perfect for my walk-in closet and it fits behind my door.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Holm

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of furniture, good storage
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together if you read, follow and take your time. Nice unit.
customer_reviews.author: firesigns

customer_reviews.title: Love the look. Easy assembling
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Holds a lot of shoes. Fits perfectly in my closet
customer_reviews.author: catbud

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The quality seems cheap. Waiting to hear back about the damage.
customer_reviews.author: Laura F Lebowitz

customer_reviews.title: This is a very sturdy product.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early and in perfect condition. All holes lined up ,instructions were very clear. A 10 of 10.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, had damage/defects when arrived
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with intact box, upon mid assembling the front long decorative bezel edging was found to have a large gash/dent in it. Sadly, it is on the front of the piece and is very noticeable. Returning item is a pain because it is too large to fit in my vehicle. Will probably just refinish the edge myself at a later date.
customer_reviews.author: Joel S.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRODUCT HOLDS ALOT OF SHOES. NICE AND STURDY AND EASY TO PUT TOGETHER.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick. Solid.
customer_reviews.text: Goes together easily and seems pretty solid when assembled. Looks good too. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tony P

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  This is a really great product.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and looks really nice. I ordered another one!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Zmijewski

product_meta.title: Prepac Shoe Storage Cabinet, 36 Pair Rack, White
product_meta.description: Simply and stylishly organize up to 36 pairs of shoes with the Space-Saving Shoe Storage Cabinet by Prepac. Fit one cabinet in a narrow entryway or combine multiple pieces from the Space-Saving collection in a large mudroom to create a custom closet look at the fraction of the cost. This shoe organizer has 36 spacious cubbies that can be used to store shoes, hats, scarves, keys, mail and any other clutter that needs organizing. Ships Ready to Assemble, includes an instruction booklet for easy assembly and has a 5-year manufacturer’s limited warranty on parts. Manufactured in Canada and meets all North American safety standards.
feature_bullets: Assembled Dimensions: 23.5"W x 72.5" H x 13" D
Dimensions for each cube: 7"W x 5.25"H x 11.75"D
Constructed from non-toxic laminated composite woods with a sturdy MDF backer
Ships Ready to Assemble, includes instruction booklet

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars422 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
